attributes.action: provide free monkeys on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please provide monkeys for disabled folk on the NHS to do jobs around the house for them.

government_responses.details:
Hi,

You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister "to provide free monkeys on the NHS".

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10551.asp

For more health news from the Office of the Prime Minister, visit us here: 
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page8821.asp 


Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NHSMonkeys/
